displaytitle: The Madonna in Glory with Angels and Saints
creditline: Gift of Frank Jewett Mather Jr.
markings: Watermark: fleur-de-lis in escutcheon with crown above, two crescent moons in upper corners and letters PB at base
inscribed: lower margin: Passini De Quadro nel Quartiere [--], black chalk

titles.title: The Madonna in Glory with Angels and Saints

makers.displaymaker: Formerly attributed to Giuseppe Passeri, Italian, 1654–1714
